By: Rand Fishkin June 8, 2005 Up & Down @ SEOmoz The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. We are officially beginning the migration of this website to SEOmoz.org and will up and down over the next 2-3 days. Please forgive us if you can't access the site, the tools or other data. We'll be running at 100% next week with a brand, spanking new site and serious upgrades to the speed and ability of the tools, including the long awaited link-pricing tool. Thanks for your patience! Copied! Back to Top
